m_szDocTitle: Mercedes GLE550 e -- Company Unveils First PHEV SUV | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: March 30th, 2015 by James Ayre   Following close on the announcement of its intent to release 10 new plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV) models by the year 2017, Mercedes-Benz just unveiled its first production plug-in hybrid electric SUV, the GLE550 e 4MATIC. The fast announcement of the high-performance plug-in model does seem to show that the company is serious about meeting its target.
